page.title: 08POPULATION.
page.content: {Population.}The total population of the Area is 381. Out of these 15.5% are Children. 12.5% are married women working fulltime in the home. 21.5% are retired people. 50.0% are either fulltime Students, in fulltime employment or un-employed. {Types of employment. } Agriculture 48 (25%) Clerical 11 ( 6%) Craftsmen 27 (14%) Factory Workers 16 ( 9%) The Professions 8 ( 4%) Service Industries 56 (29%) Students 21 (11%) Un-employed 3 ( 2%) About 26% of these are self-employed, mostly in agricultural or the building trade and a few of them are also employers, but only of a few persons.
